items.title: Thanksgiving in the Rear View, Holiday Travel Season is Underway
items.content_text: Troopers with the Nebraska State Patrol removed from the road 27 impaired drivers during the busy Thanksgiving travel weekend. Thanksgiving weekend coincided with the annual Buckle Up, Every Trip, Every Time national campaign. Troopers and dispatchers worked overtime throughout the weekend across the state. “Last weekend kicked off what will be a busy holiday travel season,”

items.title: ABNB: 4 Travel Stocks to Build Up Your Portfolio for Potential Gains
items.content_text: The travel industry has witnessed a significant rebound in the post-pandemic era and is projected to surge further due to robust demand for travel and growing consumer spending. To that end, it could be wise to add fundamentally strong stocks Airbnb (ABNB), Target Hospitality (TH), The Marcus (MCS), and Atour Lifestyle (ATAT) to one’s portfolio. Read on...

items.title: We Got Travel Advice From the First Person To Travel to Every Country Twice
items.content_text:
By the time Gunnar Garfors was 37, he had already visited every country in the world, making him the youngest person to do so. After another five years, he had visited them all again!

Garfors, a Norwegian traveler, author, journalist, and public speaker, achieved a total of 10 travel records, traversing war-torn countries like Eritrea and incredibly isolated nations like North Korea in the process. Being one of the most well-traveled people in the history of the world, he sat down with NowThis to talk about his favorite countries, travel tips, and more. The conversation has been lightly edited and condensed for clarity.
